articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Hong Kong denies entry to Human Rights Watch director
articles.description: Human Rights Watch says Hong Kong authorities have barred its executive director from entering the territory
articles.content:
HONG KONG -- 
Hong Kong authorities barred the head of Human Rights Watch from entering the Chinese territory on Sunday, the advocacy group said.
Kenneth Roth, Human Rights Watch's executive director, had planned to launch the organization's annual world re… [+750 chars]
